name: Gem Hunt (mattdaly)
description:
Gem Hunt

Collect gems and prevent your drill from overheating along the way

  • Explore procedurally generated cave systems
  • Collect as many gems as you can and watch your collection grow in the top left
  • Watch your heat bar (also top left) - drill too much and you'll overheat
  • Break blocks of ice or water to cool off your drill
  • Avoid lava

Controls

  • A, S, D to move
  • Space to drill in the current direction of movement

Made in 4 days for WeeklyGameJam #169
